RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Struggle Capability
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks influence whether or not struggling is available for prey or predator.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Struggle strength (Prey)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks influence the struggling capability for the pawn when vored by others.

RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.label: Struggle strength (Predator)
RimVore2.QuirkPoolDef.description: These quirks influence the struggling capability for the pawn when voring others.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Sedentary
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] does not mind being vored, no matter what the repercussions might be. As a result [PAWN_pronoun] will never bother to struggle.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Numbing
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label]'s stomach secretes numbing enzymes that paralyze [PAWN_possessive] prey, as a result anyone vored by [PAWN_objective] will never struggle.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Wiggler
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] knows how to move to struggle [PAWN_possessive] way out of [PAWN_possessive] predator.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is as good as anyone else at struggling.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Clumsy
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] is a bit of a klutz and can't figure out how to move to make [PAWN_possessive] predator release [PAWN_objective].

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Iron gut
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has a resolve of steel, with the guts to match. Prey will have a more difficult time trying to struggle out of [PAWN_possessive].

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Normal
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] does not have any influence on [PAWN_possessive] struggling prey.

RimVore2.QuirkDef.label: Loose
RimVore2.QuirkDef.description: [PAWN_label] has a hard time trying to keep [PAWN_possessive] prey from struggling out of [PAWN_possessive] insides.
